name: Definitions
text:
As used in this chapter, unless the context indicates otherwise:
	"Certified shorthand reporter" means a shorthand reporter certified by the Hawaii supreme court through the Hawaii board of certified shorthand reporters.
	"Official court reporter" means a certified shorthand reporter employed by the courts of the State to provide court reporting services.
	"Private court reporter" means a certified shorthand reporter who offers services on a freelance basis and who is not employed by the courts of the State. [L 1996, c 226, pt of §1]
